item.title: The 6th Directors' Conference of the Singapore Institute of Directors will prioritize innovation
item.description: Source: SID brochure. The critical importance of boards in driving innovation will be the central theme at the Singapore Institute of Directors (SID) sixth annual Directors’ Conference. Taking place on September 16, 2015, at the Marina Bay Sands, Singapore, this yearly event is designed to cultivate leadership skills for Singaporean businesses and is anticipated to draw over 800 attendees. Organized by SID, the conference will be inaugurated by guest-of-honor S Iswaran, Minister in the Prime Ministerâ€™s Office; Second Minister for Home Affairs; and Second Minister for Trade and Industry.
